inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: first developed seizures at age 13, had a second seizure two years after his first episode

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: focal epilepsy with secondary generalization, likely due to anoxic brain injury at birth

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: recently tapered off Dilantin, and it was felt that perhaps this medication was necessary to maintain him seizure free

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: use seizure calendars to record seizures throughout the trial

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: on Dilantin and phenobarbital, recently tapered off Dilantin

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability and CHF, which may interfere with the study. He is also on Dilantin, which may interact with buspirone.
